entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione burst into the room fully dressed and carrying presents for Harry and Ron. She is described as being loud and energetic.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is woken up by Hermione bursting in and shielding his eyes against the light.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is woken up by Hermione and is described as being wide awake and happy to see Hedwig.

entities.name: hedwig
entities.description: Hedwig swoops into the room carrying a small package in her beak and lands on Harry's bed.

relationships.description: Hermione greets Ron by throwing him his present.
Harry interacts with Hedwig, who lands on his bed and nibbles his ear.
